value.title: Power BI Overview Course for Complete Beginners
value.excerpt: Get started with Power BI with this easy to follow free course on Power BI fundamentals

topItems.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 1-Getting to Know Power BI)
topItems.excerpt: If you are looking for a job and need to learn Power BI this is the perfect course for you. In this course you will learn Power BI using Facebook marketing data. You can get the data set for the course here: https://github.com/Gaelim/Power-BI-Courses/blob/master/fb_campaign.csv

topItems.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 2 - Your First Graphs and Homework)

topItems.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 4 Custom Hierarchies)
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to make your own hierarchies in Power Bi which allows you to drill and set up your data for drilling. You will get additional homework questions. https://www.absentdata.com/course-material/

value.title: Administer Power BI, Part 1 - Tenants, governance, collaboration
value.excerpt: As an administrator, how do you manage a Power BI tenant? How do you configure tenant settings, monitor usage, and provision licenses and other organizational resources? This learning path covers typical tasks and tools, such as the Power BI admin portal and Office 365 admin center. You will learn how to establish and provide governance for a Power BI environment and provision Power BI Premium capacity.

topItems.title: Understand the Power BI administrator role
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to administer Power BI to support business decisions backed by data.

topItems.title: Establish a Power BI environment
topItems.excerpt: This module covers topics relating to establishing a Power BI environment within Office 365 containers.

topItems.title: Provide governance in a Power BI environment
topItems.excerpt: Learn the fundamental rules, regulations, and policies of a BI governance approach.

topItems.title: Facilitate collaboration and sharing
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to collaborate and share dashboards and reports with coworkers.

value.title: Power BI for Tableau users
value.excerpt: Are you a Tableau user who needs to learn Microsoft Power BI? This learning path enables you to leverage your existing Tableau skills to create power data-driven reports and dashboards in Power BI. You will learn to use the Microsoft Power BI desktop application and the Power BI service to connect to data, model and visualize data, and then share you findings. Finally, we provide guidance on how to produce and maintain optimized Power BI solutions.

topItems.title: Introduction to Power BI for Tableau users
topItems.excerpt: The purpose of this module is to help Tableau analysts switch from Tableau to Microsoft Power BI.

topItems.title: Connect data to Power BI for Tableau users
topItems.excerpt: This module provides the foundational information needed to connect to your data confidently with the new platform.

topItems.title: Create Power BI calculations for Tableau users
topItems.excerpt: This module provides guidance on Power BI calculation concepts, and how to create and edit calculations.

topItems.title: Organize and simplify Power BI fields for Tableau users
topItems.excerpt: This module provides guidance on how to organize and simplify your calculations.

value.excerpt: We've seen people comment that Power BI is SLOW. But, what they really mean is your report is slow. Patrick breaks things down to get you pointed in the right direction.  Chris Hamill's Blog: https://alluringbi.com/2020/08/06/consolidating-report-elements-for-improved-performance/  📢 Become a member:

value.title: Power BI for Mac?! Learn How to Make it Work! 🛠️
value.excerpt: Power BI for MAC? Do we have it? Do we not? I will show you step-by-step how you can use Power BI on MAC. What works, what doesn't and the workarounds. Links mentioned in the Video: •Get Power BI Mobile Apps for iOS, Android and Windows: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/mobile/ •Windows Virtual Machine

value.title: Power BI: How to Combine Multiple Excel Files from a Folder
value.excerpt: Bonus Video part of www.LearnPowerBI.com training program. In this video I explain how you can use Power BI to combine data from multiple excel files. I also show, for complex scenarios, how you can modify the "Sample File" that Power BI Query automatically creates, in order to update the "Custom Function"

value.title: One Slicer to filter other slicers based on Items that has value only in Power BI without BI Directi
value.excerpt: In a star schema design, how you can filter one dimension by another dimension. How you can find all the products that this customer purchased or all customers who have purchased this product using two separate slicers. To learn more about star schema: https://radacad.com/power-bi-basics-of-modeling-star-schema-and-how-to-build-it
